markdownRemark.html:
A Motivated, fast-learning and enterprising JS Developer.

👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻👩‍💻

SKILLS

I have worked on multiple projects: from web, mobile, desktop client app to DApp.Recent technology stacks applied in development:

  • Javascript ES6, Typescript, NodeJS, HTML, CSS.
  • React and related react-x libraries (React router, Redux-tool-kit), GatsbyJS, React Native, Electron, GraphQL.
  • Webpack, ESLint, babel, Jenkins, Docker, swagger, storybook, Git, NPM.
  • Cloud services such as S3, lambda and cloudwatch under AWS.
  • Blockchain: blockchain understanding, Substrate, Polkadot, polkadotJS
  • Test: Jest, Cypress, React-testing-library.

EXPERIENCES

Senior Software Engineer - Full time

ASB Bank at AKL, NZ. 2020 - Present

  • Take the ownership over my work and participate project planning.
  • Deliver features with well-test code within agile methodology.
  • Build reusable components and maintain a shared UI components library built with storybook, React and Typescript.
  • Participate code reviews cross projects and present tech topics to teams.

Full stack developer - Full time

Centrality.ai at AKL, NZ. 2017 - 2020

A venture studio focusing on blockchain service

  • Collaborate with business/design team, to understand commercial requirements and sort out the user story.
  • Develop applications from scratch, build tests, refactor specific sets of code and participate code-reviews in an agile working environment.
  • Document development solutions of app and code changes.
  • Some released project:
    rUN : An open source, cross-platform digital wallet, which can sync blockchain network, manage crypto assets and stake as a validator in Substrate-based network. As a team member, I did:
    - Implemented features using Electron, React(Hook), Gatsby independently.
    - Explored and studied Web3,Substrate APIs and PolkadotJS.
    - Supported team and delivered the product on time and on budget.
    Home page built with GatsbyJS
    Open source repo
    Why should you rUN a node and stake tokens?

    TGE APP : A token sales web application based on a smart contract in Ethereum network.As a team member, I did:
    - Built all integration tests for TGE(phase 1) with cypress, which save time and boost confidence in the deployment for hot fixes.
    - Developed UI from wireframe using React and delivered features to product environment on time.
    TGE App
    Introducing our new TGE Sales App.
    Centrality TGE raises over $100 million in under six minutes

Associate Software Engineer - Full time

HSBC Software Development Ltd. CN, 2015-2017

  • Maintained and developed existing application systems, write tests on new features (Worked with jQuery / Java/ Cloud Server, etc).
  • Performed Database(Oracle) administrative responsibilities.
  • Provided night-call support(L2) across running applications, ensured systems were in good status.
  • Collaborated with geographically dispersed teams(Hong Kong, India) and worked within the Agile methodologies.

SAP Project Coordinator - Internship

IBM - EVERGRANDE GROUP, CN 2014-2015

  • Assisted to work out project documents(Included: user requirements documents, function & test scripts) and weekly progress reports.
  • Briefed the ERP theory to non-technical users and guided key users through the operation of the system.

OTHER EXPERIENCES

  • Polkaworld Cup Hackathon - 2nd place, 09.2019, CN
    World’s First Substrate Blockchain Developing Contest
    - Brainstormed potential software solutions using blockchain in different industries with team, developed a web app for family trust-fund using substrate and React.
    - Presented proposal and code to the audiences and judges.
  • Organizer of FreeCodeCamp community - volunteer, 2016-2017, CN
    - JavaScript knowledge sharing and took part in peer programming (built apps with vueJS/ ReactJS/ Bootstrap)
    - Built a small program Node-xlxs-mail to make the mail sending task more efficient.

LANGUAGE

English Chinese(Mandarin & Cantonese)

EDUCATION

  • Bachelor in Information Management & System, 2011-2015, CN

INITIATIVES

  • Studied code of polkadot-js and raised PR when possible - 2019
  • Shared my ideas to JueJin.im - 2017:
    - JavaScript Object.defineProperty
    - Node.js | Make the mail-sending task more efficient
  • Contributed demos(vueJS) to awesome-vue project - 2017

HOBBIES

  • Illustration
  • Travel



I am not the best developer but I always try my best.👩‍💻
